title: Fragments, ca. 1790
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Foundation fabric has paired warps and paired wefts.
dimensions:
a. Warp: 41cm (16in.). Weft: 70.5cm (27 3/4in) All edges cut.
b. Warp: 41.5cm ( 16 1/8in.). Weft: 23cm (9 in.)
description: Two pieces  Small section of a large design. This section contains a windmill, a dancing couple,  commedia del'arte figures and comic scenes. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Foundation fabric has paired warps and paired wefts.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-43-a,b.
